name: Consumable Enricher Pro
description: AI-powered consumable enrichment system with Russian market compliance, comprehensive validation, and complete audit trails. Transforms supplier titles into structured product data using Gemini AI, Firecrawl web scraping, and multi-source verification.
features: NIX.ru exclusive integration for logistics data
Complete audit trail and source provenance
CSV export with enhanced data fields

aiIntegrations.gemini: Content generation, image analysis, search grounding
aiIntegrations.firecrawl: Web scraping with v2 API and autonomous research

dataCompliance.russianMarket: Strict 2+ source verification for printer compatibility
dataCompliance.auditTrail: Complete processing history and source tracking
